reviews.review_text: The case study breakdowns made all the difference. I learn best by discussion, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The video demonstrations helped me finally understand motivational interviewing.

As someone with a background in psychology, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of strengths-based and motivational interviewing approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 145% revenue increase in 3 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

As someone with a background in education, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and mindfulness-based approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
The practice exercises made all the difference. I learn best by discussion, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The video demonstrations helped me finally understand boundary setting.

As someone with a background in education, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and mindfulness-based approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 130% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The session planner was excellent, but tech implementation could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by clinical research, which builds massive credibility with clients. The progress measure has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 149% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 138% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

I've taken 9 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

I've taken 15 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 14 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 3 months using the pitch framework from the ethics module. Already made back 2x my investment.

As someone with a background in business, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and narrative therapy approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on insurance billing. The Module 5 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.
